description:
Sometimes limiting itself to the works of one or two authors, sometimes focusing on a particular theme such as "American Poetry and Democratic Culture," this course devotes itself to the study of twentieth-century Americanpoetry. 

See the English Department's website at www.english.upenn.edu for a description of the current offerings.
name: TPCS MOD AMER POETRY: Revolution of the Word in Context:  Modernisms 1

section.name: TPCS MOD AMER POETRY: Revolution of the Word in Context:  Modernisms 1
